org.apache.ignite.cache.query.TextQuery

  • Packages that use TextQuery 
    Package Description
    org.apache.ignite.cache.query
    Contains APIs for creating and executing cache queries.

    • Uses of TextQuery in org.apache.ignite.cache.query

      Methods in org.apache.ignite.cache.query that return TextQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TextQuery<K,V> TextQuery.setLocal(boolean loc)
      Sets whether this query should be executed on local node only.
      TextQuery<K,V> TextQuery.setPageSize(int pageSize)
      Sets optional page size, if 0, then default is used.
      TextQuery<K,V> TextQuery.setText(String txt)
      Sets text search string.

      Sets type for query.

      Sets type for query.
